hooks.prompt:
Check if .claude/team-argonauts.local.md exists in the project. If it exists, read the 'auto_review' setting from its YAML frontmatter.

If auto_review is 'suggest' (default) or 'auto':
- Look at what was just completed in this session
- If significant code was written or modified (not just reading/exploring):
  - If auto_review is 'suggest': Add a brief note suggesting '/team-argonauts:review' for production readiness review
  - If auto_review is 'auto': Automatically run a quick review with relevant Argonauts (based on file types modified)

If auto_review is 'off' or the setting doesn't exist: Do nothing.

Keep any suggestion brief - just one line like:
'Tip: Run /team-argonauts:review for a production-readiness check by the Argonauts team.'
